Package Model.EntityModel

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.EntityModel.Entity
Model.EntityModel.Bomb
public class Bomb extends Entity
This class manages the bomb, its explosion and the collisions between it and the other entities in the game
See Also:

    • intersect

      public boolean intersect(BlueEnemy enemy, String dir)
      Manages the collision between the blue enemy and a bomb. If the bomb is not exploding then it is removed.
      Parameters:
      enemy - : An instance of the BlueEnemy class
      dir - : the direction in which it is moving
      Returns:
      true if the enemy collides with a bomb

    • intersect

      Manages the collision between the bomb and the enemy
      Parameters:

      dir - : the direction in which the enemy is moving
      Returns:
      true if the enemy collides with the bomb

      dir - : the direction the boss is moving in
      Returns:

    • checkPoints

      private boolean checkPoints(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      It is a method that checks whether two points are equal
      Parameters:
      x1 - : the x of the first point
      y1 - : the y of the first point
      x2 - : the x of the second point
      y2 - : the y of the second point
      Returns:
      returns true if x1 equals x2 and y1 equals y2
